channel.title: VPS Trouble
channel.description:
okay so i baught a vps from trentahost and im trying to host an rsps on it i opend the port 43594 in the windows firewall on the vps but i still cant connect to the server
please help thanks

item.title: VPS Trouble
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Also, we are not your vps provider. Therefore, vps related questions should be directed to them and not us.

Read full topic

item.title: VPS Trouble
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

In order to setup his server properly he needs to do what I said on the vps plus what you also mentioned. My information is not wrong neither is yours. Vps most of the time already have the portforwarding done.

Read full topic

item.title: VPS Trouble
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

You have to on the vps:
Not do what he said

What you actually have to do:
Open internet
http://canyouseeme.org/
Use that IP
Ditch no-ip.org as its shit, unless you want to release your server.

Add exceptions for TCP and UDP on the port 43594 on firewall

Java has nothing to do with portforwarding.

Read full topic

item.title: VPS Trouble
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

You have to on the vps

  1. Re-download java
  2. Re-download no-ip
  3. Download your client and source files
  4. Add exceptions for both TCP & UDP
  5. Setup environmental variables

Read full topic

item.title: VPS Trouble
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“JoeBenton2014, post:3, topic:540988”][b]Trenta Host are good. Just try re opening the ports, and make sure you open incoming and outcoming to UDP and TCP.

Use a open port checker online to double check and make sure you set your client IP to the VPS IP.[/quote]
They are not good.
I though its run by some guy on rune-server anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: VPS Trouble
item.dc:creator: @JoeBenton2014 JoeBenton2014
item.description:
@JoeBenton2014 wrote:

[b]Trenta Host are good. Just try re opening the ports, and make sure you open incoming and outcoming to UDP and TCP.

Use a open port checker online to double check and make sure you set your client IP to the VPS IP.
